description:
Death Phantom, who calls himself Wiseman, is an immortal form of Chaos from the future. He approached Prince Demand and Saphire when they were younger and manipulated them into gathering power for him, with the ultimate goal being the opening of the Dark Gate. He promised he could give them the power and ability to go to Earth and appeal to Neo-Queen Serenity for amnesty for the citizens of Nemesis, who had committed no crimes themselves.
Source: Wiki
name: Wiseman
